attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Spit Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.name: Wafting Scent
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {G} Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Power
attacks.text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Big Bang Horn
attacks.text: This attack does 180 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Soothing Scent
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage and heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Raid
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Shelmet during this turn, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Afterimage Strike
attacks.text: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard a {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Twin Bursts
attacks.text: If Electivire is on your Bench, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a {R} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Midair Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Burning Shot
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 150 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spiral Current
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Finishing Blow
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Submission
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Steamroll
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: King's Song
ability.text: Ignore all {C} Energy in the attack cost of each of your Poliwag, Poliwhirl, and Poliwrath's attacks.

attacks.name: Ice Edge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Grenade Hammer
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Quaking Punch
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Igloo Hold
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each {C} in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Mountain Drop
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Splash Cannon
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Ice Shield
ability.text: Any damage done by an opponent's attack to each of your {W} Pokémon that has any {W} Energy attached to it is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Tag Team Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your Magmortar.

attacks.name: Gigavolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Positive Hand
attacks.text: Discard a basic Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Electric Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Negative Discard
attacks.text: Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Lightning Slam
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Lightning Slam during your next turn.

attacks.name: Raging Thunder Punch
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Short
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Entrainment
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Sinister Suggestion
attacks.text: Whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her next turn, treat it as tails.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Hand Control
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a Supporter card you find there. If you do, your opponent plays that Supporter card. However, you make all decisions for that card. (That Supporter card is discarded.)

ability.name: Victory Kiss
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hug
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fortunate Eye
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back on top of his or her deck in any order.

ability.name: Teleport Room
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, put a Stadium card with a different name from your discard pile into play.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Wreck
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

ability.name: Fighting Fury
ability.text: Each of your {F} Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Machamp Crush
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

ability.name: Thick Fat
ability.text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's {R} or {W} Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.text: Return this Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Shout of Power
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bad-Influence Evolution
attacks.text: If you have any {D} Pokémon on your Bench, search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Comet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chew Up
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has any Special Energy attached to it, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

ability.name: Shining Spirit
ability.text: Damage from this Pokémon's attacks isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Flying Press
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't a Pokémon-EX, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Counterattack
ability.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moonsault Stomp
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.text: Move an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Echoed Voice
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Echoed Voice attack does 50 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Secret Key
ability.text: Each of your {Y} Pokémon's Resistance is now -40.

attacks.name: Fairy Lock
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Bust In
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may move any number of basic Energy attached to your Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jet Sonic
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Charge Energy
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Rainbow Shower
attacks.text: Attach as many basic Energy cards as you like from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sand Sweep
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it.

ability.name: Echolocation
ability.text: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Boomburst
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Lickichop
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

ability.name: Energy Evolution
ability.text: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Big Yawn
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Knuckle Sandwich
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Safety Check
attacks.text: Look at 1 of your face-down Prize cards.

attacks.name: Thorough Crunch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Held-Item Inspection
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose an Item card you find there. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Twister Throw
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Push Down
attacks.text: You may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Battle Reporter
text: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.

name: Energy Switch
text: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

name: Fighting Stadium
text: The attacks of each Fighting Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) do 20 more damage to the Defending Pokémon-EX (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Focus Sash
text: If the Fighting Pokémon this card is attached to has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, that Pokémon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead. Then, discard this card.

name: Fossil Researcher
text: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Amaura or Tyrunt and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Full Heal
text: Remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon.

name: Jaw Fossil
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Tyrunt you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Korrina
text: Search your deck for a Fighting Pokémon and an Item card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Maintenance
text: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your deck. (If you can't shuffle 2 cards into your deck, you can't play this card.) Then, draw a card.

name: Mountain Ring
text: Prevent all damage done to Benched Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

name: Sail Fossil
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Amaura you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Sparkling Robe
text: The Pokémon this card is attached to can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting that Pokémon.)

name: Super Scoop Up
text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.

name: Tool Retriever
text: Choose up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to your Pokémon and put them into your hand.

name: Training Center
text: Each Stage 1 and Stage 2 Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets +30 HP.

name: Herbal Energy
text:
This card can only be attached to Grass Pokémon. This card provides Grass Energy only while this card is attached to a Grass Pokémon.

When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Grass Pokémon, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.

(If this card is attached to anything other than a Grass Pokémon, discard this card.)

name: Strong Energy
text:
This card can only be attached to Fighting Pokémon. This card provides Fighting Energy only while this card is attached to a Fighting Pokémon.

The attacks of the Fighting Pokémon this card is attached to do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

(If this card is attached to anything other than a Fighting Pokémon, discard this card.)
